Package com.osoc6.OSOC6.repository

Interface StudentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Student,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Student,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Student,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Student>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Student,Long>
@PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public interface StudentRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Student,Long>
This is a simple class that defines a repository for Student, this is needed for the database.

      @NonNull @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'COACH\')") @Query("select s from Student s where :#{hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')} = true or s.edition.id in :#{@spelUtil.userEditions(authentication.principal)}") @NonNull org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Student> findAll(@NonNull @NonNull org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findById

    • findByEdition

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\') or @spelUtil.userEditions(authentication.principal).contains(#edition)") @Query("select s from Student s where s.edition.id = :edition") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Student> findByEdition(@Param("edition") Long editionId, @NonNull @NonNull org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get all students within an edition.
      Parameters:
      editionId - the id of the edition you want to see the projects of
      pageable - argument needed to return a page
      Returns:
      page of matching students

    • findByQuery

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\') or @spelUtil.userEditions(authentication.principal).contains(#edition)") @Query(value="SELECT DISTINCT ON (stud.id) stud.* FROM student stud INNER JOIN (SELECT inner_ed.* FROM edition inner_ed WHERE :edition is not null and inner_ed.id = :#{@spelUtil.safeLong(#edition)}) as ed ON (stud.edition_id = ed.id) where (:freeText is null or to_tsvector(CAST(stud as text) || (select COALESCE(string_agg(CAST(sugg as text), \'\'), \'\') from suggestion sugg where sugg.student_id = stud.id) || (select COALESCE(string_agg(CAST(assign as text), \'\'), \'\') from assignment assign where assign.student_id = stud.id) ) @@ to_tsquery(:#{@spelUtil.safeToTSQuery(#freeText)})) and (:skills is null or to_tsvector((select COALESCE(string_agg(CAST(studskill as text), \'\'), \'\') from student_skills studskill where studskill.student_id = stud.id) ) @@ to_tsquery(:#{@spelUtil.safeToTSQuery(#skills)})) and (:experience is null or stud.osoc_experience in :#{@spelUtil.safeArray(#experience)}) and (:status is null or stud.status in :#{@spelUtil.safeArray(#status)}) and (:#{@spelUtil.safeBoolean(#unmatched)} = false or NOT EXISTS (select assign from assignment assign where assign.student_id = stud.id and assign.is_valid = true))", nativeQuery=true) org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Student> findByQuery(@Param("edition") Long edition, @Param("freeText") String freeText, @Param("skills") String skills, @Param("experience") String[] experience, @Param("unmatched") Boolean unmatched, @Param("status") String[] status, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Query over students by their experience, edition, skills and free text search.
      Parameters:
      edition - the id of the edition this search is restricted to (required argument).
      experience - list of experiences that the user should have one of
      status - list of statuses that the user should have one of
      skills - free text search parameter restricted to the skills of a user
      freeText - free text search over the student, and the assignment or suggestion reason. This field is formatted in a way that a space means a search for a separate, not necessarily consecutive word.
      unmatched - boolean parameter, when true only unmatched students will be returned
      pageable - argument needed to return a page
      Returns:
      Page of matching students

    • findConflict

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\') or @spelUtil.userEditions(authentication.principal).contains(#edition)") @Query(value="SELECT DISTINCT ON (stud.id) stud.* FROM student stud INNER JOIN (SELECT inner_ed.* FROM edition inner_ed WHERE :edition is not null and inner_ed.id = :#{@spelUtil.safeLong(#edition)}) as ed ON (stud.edition_id = ed.id) where (Select count(distinct skill.id) from (select inner_assign.* from assignment inner_assign where inner_assign.is_valid = true and inner_assign.student_id = stud.id) as assign inner join project_skill skill on (assign.project_skill_id = skill.id)) > 1", nativeQuery=true) org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Student> findConflict(@Param("edition") Long edition, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Return the students that are assigned to multiple projects through valid assignments.
      Parameters:
      edition - the edition in which this query operates.
      pageable - argument needed to return a page
      Returns:
      Page of matching students
